flawed_nl_solution:
It takes 1 hour * 3 = <<1*3=3>>3 hours for Mark to get to the national park.
The extra time it takes Mark to get to the national park is 3 hours - 1 hour = <<3-1=7>>7 hours
Mark should leave his home at 11 a.m. - 7 hours = <<11-7=4>>4 a.m.
